attributes.action: Make it compuslary for doctors surgerys to have hand held B.M.I counters instead of going by weight.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, I was told my by doctor, I was obese, this was 'diagnosed' by my weight, using scales.  I went to a gym, and had a hand held B.M.I machine, which calculated my B.M.I to be a lot less than the doctor said, making me just overweight, not obese.  I think this is dangerous, as people could get told they are obese, when they are obviously not, thus causing them more problems than it should - ie anorexia.
